articles.description: More than 80% of adults think the U.S. economy is likely to experience a recession in 2022, according to the CNBC + Acorns Invest in You survey.
articles.content:
After two years of the coronavirus pandemic, a recession and a rapid recovery, Americans are worried that the economy may swiftly decline once again.
Some 81% of adults said they think the U.S. econ… [+3959 chars]
